title: The Killifish
brief_description: A study of the life cycle of the killifish, showing it in streams and ponds, but principally in aquariums. The physical conditions and feed requirements are explained. Egglaying, and the development of the young fish are shown. Uses Photomicroscopy. English commentary, Japanese subtitles.
